# amount

**Instance Property**

The nonnegative cost associated with this shipping method.

## Declaration

```swift
required DOMString amount;
```

## Discussion

The amount must be nonnegative to pass validation.

## Working with shipping method properties

- **label**: A short description of the shipping method.
- **detail**: Additional description of the shipping method.
- **dateComponentsRange**: The expected range of dates for shipping or picking up an item.
- **identifier**: A client-defined value used to identify this shipping method.
- **ApplePayDateComponentsRange**: A dictionary that specifies the start and end dates for a range of time.
